column4: Can I just do "dd if=ubuntu-9.04-netbook-remix-i386.img of=/dev/sdb" instead of the instructions here to make the LiveUSB? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromImgFiles#Ubuntu
You will need to use cdrecord to make a CD, (if that is what you are trying to do).
Thanks, but I found that I'm probably Doing It Right from the Debian Wiki.
